post.description:
## Overview
Create a new booking (appointment or event attendance) Available for **Staff and App tokens**.

arrival_window_value.description: Optional for appointment only .Arrival window value is in minutes and limited to 540 (9 hours)

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

interaction_details.description: Address. Required when service location set to: Client will set the address at booking

time_zone.description: Default is set to UTC if not provided

post.description:
## Overview
Accept a pending booking Available for **Staff and App tokens**.

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

put.description:
## Overview
Cancel an existing booking Available for **Staff and App tokens**.

booking_id.description: Booking (appointment/event) uid. (Can also be an array for batch cancel)

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

post.description:
## Overview
Mark a booking as no-show Available for **Staff and App tokens**.

put.description:
## Overview
Update booking details including start time, staff, and notes Available for **Staff and App tokens**.

allow_double_booking.description: Should allow overlapping with a different booking if time/duration is changed (True by default)

auto_follow_up_hours.description: How many hours after the booking to send the automatic follow up message

interaction_details.description: Details of the meeting (address/ phone number

meeting_reminder_sms_1.description: Should send the client an SMS with the first reminder

meeting_reminder_sms_2.description: Should send the client an SMS with the second reminder

message.description: A message to be sent to the client after updating the booking

notify_client.description: If true a message about the update with the 'message' field would be sent to the client

padding.description: The padding duration before of the booking

remind_before_in_hours_1.description: How many hours before the booking to send the first reminder

remind_before_in_hours_2.description: How many hours before the booking to send the second reminder

sms_booking_confirmation.description: Should send the client an SMS with the booking confirmation

start_time.description: The start time of the booking in UTC (ISO 8601 format)'

put.description:
## Overview
External app bulk create external items Available for **Staff and App tokens**.

calendar_sync.description: The external app provider and the requested email to sync to (by the staff)

account.description: The requested email to sync to by the staff (e.g. aaa@gmail.com)

put.summary: External app bulk create external items

General availability - Create new time slot Available for **Staff and App tokens**.

day.description: A number representing the day of the week (0 - sunday, 6 - saturday)
